articles.content:

articles.title: FIFA opens disciplinary case into Argentina over team's alleged misconduct during World Cup final celebration
articles.description: Argentina's celebration was a wild one, and it got the attention of FIFA
articles.content:
Argentina did a lot of celebrating after winning the 2022 World Cup in Qatar. Enough celebrating, in fact, to attract the attention of FIFA.

articles.title: FIFA Opens Disciplinary Proceedings Against Argentina Over World Cup Final Celebrations
articles.description: FIFA said Argentina had potentially breached rules regarding offensive behaviour and violations of the principles of fair play and misconduct of players and officials
articles.content:
FIFA on Friday announced it had opened disciplinary proceedings against Argentina for “offensive behaviour" during their World Cup final triumph over France last month.

articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina toil to beat South Africa 1-0 in FIH men’s World Cup opener
articles.description: But it was far from rosy for the Los Leones as it was South Africa who pressed hard in the first quarter but failed to convert their chances into positive results.
articles.content: Former Olympic champions Argentina were made to toil by world No.14 South Africa before registering a 1-0 win in the opening Pool A match of the FIH men’s hockey World Cup here on Friday. After a barren and hard-fought first two quarters, Argentina, ... [1021 chars]
